title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at B'nai B'rith International in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: I had a phone interview because I was a student, not in Washington DC at the time. It was very conversational, and the questions were rather straight forward. I heard back within 2 weeks, with  very little follow up.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in religious, primarily Jewish legislative policy? What sort of experience do you have event planning or managing a variety of different tasks each day?

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at B'nai B'rith International (Milan)
Interview Descriptions: The interview took place in the presence of the then complete Executive Committee, I was questioned on my past experience, office organisation, possibility to work on an independant basis, organisation of events, conventions, meetings, language skills
